participant_1.background:
I like mangoes because they are sweet and juicy.
i got a new job.
I am not an avid exerciser, but I do enjoy walking on the beach with my family.
I hope my wedding planning business keeps booming as the weather warms up.
my wife recently got laid off from her human resources job.

participant_2.background:
I'm not sure I could be a professional dog walker if I were blind because I wouldn't be able to see where the dogs are going.
My medication makes me sleepy sometimes, so I once pretended to be asleep in my car in order to get out of a speeding ticket.
I prefer to listen to my own music on my own terms.
cooking is my passion.
My family is very supportive of my sleep schedule and my need for exercise.

content.text: Hey there, how are you doing today?
Hi, I'm doing well, thanks for asking. How are you?
I'm doing good as well. I just got a new job as a wedding planner, so I'm excited to get started.
That sounds like a fun job! I'm sure you'll do great.
Thanks! I hope so. I'm also hoping that my wife's new job keeps booming as the weather warms up. She was recently laid off from her human resources job.
Oh, I'm sorry to hear that. I hope she finds a new job soon.
Thanks. Me too. Do you have any fun plans for the weekend?
I'm not sure yet. I might go for a walk on the beach with my family. We like to do that when the weather is nice.
That sounds like fun. I love walking on the beach.
What do you like to do for fun?
I like to cook, listen to music, and exercise.
I like to cook too. What are some of your favorite dishes to make?
I love making pasta dishes. I also like to make homemade pizza.
Those sound delicious. I love pasta too.
